tool_description: Creates a structured weekly meal schedule by assigning selected recipes to specific days and meal times based on preferences and constraints.

recipe_ids.description: List of recipe IDs to include in the meal plan

start_date.description: Start date for the meal plan (ISO 8601 format)

meals_per_day.description: Number of main meals per day (2-5)

include_snacks.description: Whether to include snacks in the schedule

prep_day.description: Preferred meal prep day (monday-sunday or none)

repeat_meals.description: Allow repeating meals during the week

dietary_profile.description: Dietary profile ID for consistency checking

error_messages: Insufficient recipes: Need at least 7 recipe IDs for a weekly plan.
Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).
Invalid meals per day: Must be between 2 and 5.
Invalid prep day: Must be a day of the week (monday-sunday) or 'none'.
Recipe mismatch: Some recipes don't match the dietary profile requirements.
Scheduling conflict: Unable to create balanced schedule with provided recipes.
usage: Provide recipe_ids array, start_date, and dietary_profile. Optionally customize meals_per_day, include_snacks, prep_day, and repeat_meals preferences.

schedule_id.description: Unique identifier for the created meal schedule

week_dates.description: Array of dates covered by the meal plan

daily_schedules.description: Daily meal schedules with assigned recipes

total_unique_recipes.description: Number of unique recipes used in the plan

estimated_weekly_prep_time.description: Total estimated preparation time in minutes
